text: We have never been more satisfied with the quality and workmanship of any project we have contracted in our 42 years of marriage.  Deck Masters owner, Jordan and his crew are great.. They are not only hard working, but were enjoyable to be around.  They are just good people.  Justin (the lead foreman)  is a perfectionist and an artist.  We are very fortunate that we found Deck Masters.  It was a very enjoyable process from the first meeting with Kevin to the completion of the project with Jordan.  We give Deck Masters our highest recommendation.
author: Jeff Gaylard
